Package com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm

All the Finite Difference Method code is contained in this package

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Derivative This interface defines the features of a derivative to be priced in the Finite Difference Method.
FiniteDifferenceModel The core of the Finite Difference Method calculation is performed by classes implementing this interface.
Grid Finite Difference Method data structure.
 

Class Summary
BaseGrid Base class for implementing Grid objects.
BinaryCashOrNothingOption Implementation of a binary "cash-or-nothing" option.
ExplicitMethod Implementation of the Explicit method for Finite Difference Method.
ExplicitMethodConstantVolatility Implementation of ExplicitMethod with constant volatility.
ExplicitMethodUncertainVolatility Implementation of the ExplicitMethod for uncertain volatility.
FiniteDifferencePricer Skeleton of the Finite Difference Method
FullGrid Memory-intensive implementation of Grid.
Option Base class for options
Portfolio Implements a container of other derivatives, exposing a Derivative interface.
StaticHedgingStrategy High level class representing a trading strategy with static hedging.
StaticHedgingStrategyOptimizationAdapter An adapter that makes a StaticHedgingStrategy suitable for optimization by a MultivariateRealOptimizer
TwoStepsGrid A memory optimized implementation of Grid that can run any number of time step using the same amount of memory, by discarding the old steps.
VanillaOption An implementation of plain vanilla option
 

Enum Summary
Option.Direction The direction of an option: CALL or PUT
 

Package com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm Description

All the Finite Difference Method code is contained in this package

The core classes are

  • FiniteDifferencePricer
  • FiniteDifferenceModel
  • Derivative
    • StaticHedgingStrategy provides glue code to interact with the hedged portfolio and the Finite Difference pricing method from a single class.
